title: Thomas Rhett gives an update on his pregnant wife and their daughters
text:
Thomas Rhett gives an update on his pregnant wife and their daughters originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Thomas Rhett and his wife, Lauren, are expecting their third daughter in February, and the "Remember You Young" hit-maker said nobody's more excited than his older girls, 3-year-old Willa and 2-year-old Ada.

"They're really, really pumped. We're all really excited," Rhett told ABC News. "Before I had kids, I never really imagined that I would be this at peace with two [kids] and one on the way."

"I thought I'd be like, 'What in the world is happening?'" he continued. "But me and Lauren were actually talking the other day about [how] even though our lives are insanely chaotic, and we never really stop going, and we just kept growing our family, we really do feel right now that we're at a more peaceful spot than we've ever been. Maybe we found the calm in the crazy somehow."

(MORE: Thomas Rhett clears up rumor that he's disappointed to have 3rd daughter)

And what exactly does Thomas Rhett mean by crazy?

"Lauren, she's 23 weeks pregnant and still kind of sick. But I've heard that the second or third babies can do that to you," he said. "We're moving, because we've completely outgrown our house. And now we have somewhere for everybody to sleep, which is nice."

"But we're just pumped," he added, "and you know, Willa Gray and Ada are always are touching Lauren's stomach. And we haven't picked her name yet, but we've got a few floating around, and [we're] trying to figure it out."

Rhett celebrated his latest two No. 1 hits, "Sixteen" and "Look What God Gave Her," during a party Wednesday afternoon on the rooftop at BMI in Nashville. This weekend, he closes out his Very Hot Summer Tour at Bridgestone Arena in Music City.
